string.text: Military? What are you doing in stalker camp?
It's gonna be a good day. Here you go.
Great, take it.
Well, come visit me, I have it all right here.
Nope, I don't have such money. See you later.
I'll take control one.
I'll take both.
Huh, it's tough times now, dear. Seriously - take it both for thirty five grands or control module alone for twenty five. How about that?
Why so young pal is so greedy, huh?
Three joints.
Of course. How much?
No need to get it, I have it. Wait... Yes, here it is. Also I have robotic aiming module as an upgrade. Do you want it?
Well, I need control module for "Warder" APC. Can you get it?
Talk to me, I can get plenty of stuff.
No, I don't need a shooter for now, but another thing, a little bit trickier..
What, you want some rare shooter?
Listen, Zadov, I have a business with you.
Oh, another customer! Come here, don't be so shy!

You, quiet here, sergeants are nervous. Keep your gun in your pants. We're not military anymore, we're on our own for last couple of months. Officially we're M.I.A. Serving in Institute is a suicide, man. When it became impossible I made a deal with sergeants and we "desappeared". But there's still a bond with friends, we trades artifacts for ammo, meds and other equipment. Just need some more money to leave Zone. However, when somebody alarmed Institute, we got a jackpot. Military in Institute received enormous amount of excellent equipment and now we sell it, inexpensively. So don't be shy, check it and we can make a deal.
Well, show me your stuff.
Sup, Bartender, how you got here?
I'm not him, I'm his brother. We have a deal with the bandits: loot for equipment and food. Also I sell the junk that they bring to me. Got it? So what's your business? Are we trading or not?
Of course.
Listen, do you know how to get to Wild Territories from here?
Best way is through City-32, check this coords. That's the way for wise guys, like you and me. Beware of snipers in the ctiy!
Hi, merc!
You don't croak either, goner. Need for some expensive superior equipment? Looking for something special?
Yeah, allright!
You're here a long time, as I see. Maybe you know some short paths from Red Forest to the Southern Zone? There are lots of troubles when travelling through the Warehouses...

Yes, I know. My clients should stay safe, huh? There are two paths to the Southern Zone: one to Dark Valley, other to Yantar. There are dangerous places over there so follow paths carefully! Say hello to Sidor, if you see him.
You must be "Monolith" supplier.
You're almost right, stalker. Don't ask me about my business here. Just remember - "Monolith" isn't just a bunch of fanatics like they appear. They have... patrons
And what about the emission? This is Red Forest nearby!

I have special helmet from "friends" from outside. Don't even try to get it - it has self-destruction system, you'll kill us both. Listen, my employer asked me to warn you about Reactor hall. He'll contact to you by himself maybe but for now the message for you is "Not all the things are what they seem..."
Well, I'm tired of all of this!
